attributes.action: Legislate so as to Prevent all future UK Governments from duplicitous announcements.In particular to forbid the use of unelected advisers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Introduce legislation to prevent this and future Governments, hiding by duplicity("SPIN") from the electorate, all matters which affect the UK and its populace.Further to prevent the use of unelected advisors.
